site_name: GREAT BAY COMMUNITY COLLEGE VETERINARY TECHNOLOGY PROGRAM

citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The August 2022 signed semi annual report from the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) was not
submitted to the Institutional Official. Signed semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official ensure that the institutional
official is informed about the activities of the IACUC and program for which they are responsible. The facility must ensure
that the Institutional Official receives the signed report from the IACUC semi annually.
Correct by the next inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(c)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The August 2022 signed semi annual report from the Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC) was not 
submitted to the Institutional Official.  Signed semi-annual reports to the Institutional Official ensure that the institutional 
official is informed about the activities of the IACUC and program for which they are responsible.  The facility must ensure 
that the Institutional Official receives the signed report from the IACUC semi annually.    
 
Correct by the next inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative. 
 
End Section
